General.Name: Chinyang Poly
General.Description: Chinyang Poly Urethane Co.,Ltd produces and supplies polyurethane foam products in South Korea. It serves furniture, automobile, shoes, construction, packaging, and electronics industries. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Pyeongtaek-si, South Korea.

0.Name: Hyun-Jin  Yu
0.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Pres and Representative Director
